title: Anorgasmia
summary: Anorgasmia is a type of sexual dysfunction in which a person cannot achieve orgasm despite adequate stimulation. Anorgasmia is far more common in females (4.6 percent)[1] than in males and is especially rare in younger men. The problem is greater in women who are post-menopause.[1] In males, it is most closely associated with delayed ejaculation. Anorgasmia can often cause sexual frustration.
